Title: Petit White (PW)
Description: The Petit White (PW) collection stands as the premier choice for those designing a refreshing yet inviting kitchen ambiance. Nothing brightens a room like tasteful white cabinetry, complete with three-quarter-inch solid wood front frames.
List: Wall ½” picture frame recess style

Title: Petit Blue (PD)
Description: Looking for something a bit more sophisticated? Our Petite Blue (PD) collection offers a rich dark blue finish that perfectly complements design-forward spaces. Whether you’re aiming for a modern or classic aesthetic, these cabinets will stand as the centerpiece of your kitchen.
List: Wall ½” picture frame recess style
Concealed 6-way adjustable soft close door hinges

Title: Petit Sand (PS)
Description: Harness the innate beauty of natural wood finishes with our Petite Sand (PS) series. These cabinets offer a warm contemporary charm, as well as versatile tones that can suit a wide range of kitchen styles.
List: Wall ½” picture frame recess style

Title: Petit Brown (PR)
Description: Boasting a rich, enduring brown finish, the Petite Brown (PR) series offers a darker alternative to the PS line. These cabinets will imbue any kitchen with a sense of warmth and depth, as well as a more elegant atmosphere.
List: Wall ½” picture frame recess style
